attributes.action: birth certificate for babies born to soon (jack moses martin)
attributes.additional_details: babies born to soon-babies born below 20 weeks do not qualify as people they r considered a fetus, they have a heart beat hands and feet n blood through there veins. yet after giving birth early to see and hold your beautiful baby so perfectly formed to be told your not intittled to a birth certificate or a funeral this is painfull and wrong we have human rights for a reason so why do these beautiful babies have not. we need to make a change
